name: Robbin Rat - ISIL Game Jam
description:
Game jam made in less than 16 hours with most of the content created within the jam itself, including the music and sounds, programming and part of the art.

Concept: You are a mother rat with a mission to ensure that your babies do not starve during the night, you have to bring at least 3 pieces of food before times runs out! Be careful with the hazards and guardians of the house!

Team members:

  1. Arenas Ramos, Marko.
  2. Muro Giurfa, Eduardo.
  3. Rojas Valdivia, Luis.
  4. Sullon Rodrigues, Saluo.
  5. Zubieta Cordova, Mercedes.

This entry became the winner of the Jam! Link: https://www.instagram.com/reel/CIYWI9BlfqF/
